_sText:
De_herat by lumpox.
==================
Dust based map. The map has 32 spawnpoints. Please give me some feedback and rate. If you find any bugs please report them to me and I'll try to fix them as soon as possible.

Features
------------------
Light environment,
3d skybox,
Dust particles,
Ropes,
Dynamic Water,
Custom textures ,    
Wind,
Smoke,
MiniMap (overview)

[Video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axWlmyqX8K0 "Video")

### Special thanks to
-TopHATTwaffle
_Tutorials and textures_
